QuestData.Title: High Commander Halford Wyrmbane
QuestData.Description: <Greer hands the missive back to you.>$B$BSkysong will take you to Wintergarde, $n. I guarantee you that it will be the fastest flight you've ever taken. Go now!
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Alliance Missive to High Commander Halford Wyrmbane at Wintergarde Keep in eastern Dragonblight.
QuestData.CompletionText: What have you got there, soldier?
QuestData.RewardText: <The High Commander reads the missive and then crumples it up.>$B$BDo you know where the people on this list are now? Take a look outside, near the front gate. They're the ones hanging from the arches.$B$BGhoul bait...
